item.title: Insurance Terms in English
item.description:
Navigating the world of insurance can sometimes feel like learning a new language. Policies are filled with specific jargon and concepts that, if misunderstood, can lead to confusion and potentially impact your coverage. But don’t worry, you don’t need a law degree to understand your insurance. By familiarizing yourself with a few key terms, you can decode the language of insurance and make more informed decisions about your protection.

Let’s break down some of the most common terms you’ll encounter:
